name: Niral dti pipeline
tagline: Python scripts to execute a DTI pipeline.
body:
# NIRAL DTI PIPELINE

Scripts required to run this pipeline:
* dwi_to_dti.py
* nonrigid_registration.py
* wap_image.py
* fdt_bedpost.py
* extract_brain_region.py
* create_fdt_masks.py
* fdt_probtrackx2.py

You must have a config folder in which all of the config files will be placed
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
